Class Customer

    • Customer

      public Customer (int customerID, String customerName, String customerContact, Address customerAddress, String customerPhone, String customerEmail, String customerVatNo, String customerUsername, String customerPassword)
      Full Constructor for Customer Objects
      Parameters:
      customerID - - Integer parameter to store Customer IDs
      customerName - - String parameter to store Customer Name
      customerContact - - String parameter to store Customer Contact Name
      customerAddress - - Address Object parameter to store Customer Address
      customerPhone - - String parameter to store Customer Phone Number
      customerEmail - - String parameter to store Customer Email
      customerVatNo - - String parameter to store Customer Vat Number
      customerUsername - - String parameter to store Customer Username
      customerPassword - - String parameter to store Customer Password

      customerPassword - - String parameter to store Customer Password
